title: Commercial Building for Sale in Colombo - 15
details:
Commercial building for sale in Colombo 15

The building has 3 floors with approximately 5000 square feet per floor, total being 15000 Square Feet

Facility for container unloading within the permissions

Land extent - 38 perches

40 feet road frontage

30 feet road access (easily for container movement)

Ideal for use as store or any commercial purpose

(Value of the building not quoted for the asking price)

Total Price: Rs 190 Million (Negotiable)

Please call for more information
Pan Global Property Developers (Pvt) Ltd
